subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Biathlon
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: The men’s 15-kilometer mass start biathlon at the Sochi Games was rescheduled for Tuesday, and the men’s snowboard cross will go straight to the finals, also on Tuesday.
snippet: The men’s 15-kilometer mass start biathlon at the Sochi Games was rescheduled for Tuesday, and the men’s snowboard cross will go straight to the finals, also on Tuesday.
